snippet: Gerald Wallace has the hustle, strength, grit and versatility to help mold the identity of the Nets and also lead the charge, with the help of a supporting cast, against Miami.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column maintains that Brooklyn Nets forward Gerald Wallace is almost as indispensable to the team as point guard Deron Williams; asserts that Wallace is the team's hustle, strength, grit and versatility.
lead_paragraph: Gerald Wallace has the hustle, strength, grit and versatility to help mold the identity of the Nets and also lead the charge, with the help of a supporting cast, against Miami.

headline.seo: Nets Team, With Gerald Wallace, Shaped With Heat in Mind
headline.main: A Player, and a Nets Team, Shaped to Challenge the Heat
headline.print_headline: A Player, and a Nets Team, Shaped to Challenge the Heat
